title: 解析学
column4: 一般的な測度による全空間積分.

title: ベクトル解析
commentary: \begin{aligned}\grad f &= \nabla f = \rbk{\frac{\partial}{\partial x^1},\frac{\partial}{\partial x^2},\frac{\partial}{\partial x^3}} f \\ &= \sum_{i=1}^3 \frac{\partial f}{\partial x^i} \vectore_i = \sum_{i=1}^3 f_{,i} \vectore_i = \delta_i^j f_{,j} \vectore_i\end{aligned}
column4: 添字の上下はいろいろある.

title: ベクトル解析
commentary: \begin{aligned}\rot \vectorB &= \nabla \times \vectorB \\ &= \rbk{\frac{\partial}{\partial x^1},\frac{\partial}{\partial x^2},\frac{\partial}{\partial x^3},} \times \rbk{B^1,B^2,B^3} \\ &= \rbk{\frac{\partial B^3}{\partial x^2} - \frac{\partial B^2}{\partial x^3}, \frac{\partial B^1}{\partial x^3} - \frac{\partial B^3}{\partial x^1}, \frac{\partial B^2}{\partial x^1} - \frac{\partial B^1}{\partial x^2}} \\ &= \rbk{\ep^{ij}_{k} \partial_j A^k} \vectore_i = \ep^{ij}_{k} A^k_{,j} \vectore_i.\end{aligned}
column4: 添字の上下はいろいろある.

title: ベクトル解析
commentary: \begin{aligned}\divergence \vectorB &= \nabla \cdot \vectorB \\ &= \rbk{\frac{\partial}{\partial x^1},\frac{\partial}{\partial x^2},\frac{\partial}{\partial x^3},} \cdot \rbk{B^1,B^2,B^3} \\ &= \frac{\partial B^1}{\partial x^1} + \frac{\partial B^2}{\partial x^2} + \frac{\partial B^3}{\partial x^3} = \partial_i B^i = B^i_{,i}.\end{aligned}
column4: 添字の上下はいろいろある.
